seo.title: Support - Get Help from Real People
seo.description: 24/7 support from real humans, not bots. Average 2-minute response time. Get help with domains, hosting, SSL, and site migration. We're here when you need us.

hero.title: 24/7 Customer Support - You're Not Alone in This
hero.description: Real people. Real answers. No bots, no scripts, no runaround. Just human support when you need it.
hero.imageAlt: Friendly support team member ready to help

howWeHelp.title: How we help
howWeHelp.description: We don't do support like everyone else. We're here to solve problems, not just answer tickets.

listen.title: We listen first
listen.description: No assumptions. No copy-paste responses. We take the time to understand what you're actually trying to do.

guide.title: We guide, not lecture
guide.description: Technical jargon doesn't help anyone. We explain things in plain language and walk you through solutions step by step.

stay.title: We stay until it's fixed
stay.description: Your problem doesn't get "closed" until you're satisfied. We follow through until everything works the way it should.

channels.title: Reach us however you prefer
channels.description: We're available 24/7 through multiple channels. Pick what works best for you.

liveChat.title: Live chat
liveChat.description: Talk to a real person right now. Average response time: 2 minutes.

email.title: Email support
email.description: Prefer writing things out? We respond to every email, usually within an hour.

migration.title: Migration help
migration.description: Moving your site? We'll handle the technical work so you don't have to worry.

responseTimes.title: When can you expect to hear back?
responseTimes.description: We believe in setting honest expectations. Here's what you can count on.

liveChat.title: Live chat
liveChat.description: Real-time conversation with a human. No waiting in queue, no automated messages.

email.title: Email support
email.description: Detailed, thoughtful responses to your questions. Often faster than an hour, especially during business hours.

urgent.title: Urgent issues
urgent.description: Site down? Critical problem? We prioritize emergencies and jump on them right away.

responseTimes.note: These are averages during normal circumstances. During major outages or high-volume periods, response times may be longer—but we'll always keep you informed.

cta.title: Need help right now?
cta.description: We're here. No automated systems, no waiting—just real people ready to help.
